metadata.title: CVE-2024-3772 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Regular expression denial of service in Pydanic < 2.4.0, < 1.10.13 allowsremote attackers to cause denial of service via a crafted email string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-3772` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pydantic - 1.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pydantic package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
